Text: Transwestern StorageKevin Thanks for the system map As we discussed previously Crystal Gas Storage is pursuing the possible development of a natural gas storage facility near Phoenix on the Luke salt deposit We would like to discuss in more detail the possible expansion of the Transwestern system and a possible interconnect with the storage facility We are in Houston almost weekly and would like to schedule a meeting at your convenience If you would like to pursue these discussions could you check your calendar and suggest some possible dates You can contact me via email or by phone at If I am not available please contact Jeff Ballew at Thanks David Hayden Crystal Gas Storage This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
